title-part.text: NON-PORTABLE LIGHTING DEVICES OR SYSTEMS THEREOF

note.note-paragraph:
1. This subclass covers devices or systems intended for fixed installation, e.g. vehicle lighting, or for use at a permanent location, e.g. free-standing floor- or table-lamps.
2. This subclass does not cover devices or systems specially adapted for transportation, which are covered by subclass F21L.
3. Non-electric lighting devices or systems are classified in groups F21S11/00 to F21S15/00 only if a special adaptation related to the use of a non-electric light source is of interest.

title-part.text: Electric lighting
Systems of lighting devices, not provided for in main groups F21S4/00 to F21S10/00 or F21S19/00 , e.g. of modular construction

CPC-specific-text.text: of modular construction

title-part.text: Lighting devices or systems using a string or strip of light sources

CPC-specific-text.text: using a string of light sources, i.e. lighting devices or systems where the light sources are supported by loose electric cables, e.g. Christmas tree lights
the strings forming a grid, net or web structure
using a strip of light sources, i.e. lighting devices or systems where the light sources are supported on a linear support
the lighting device being flexible or deformable, e.g. into a curved shape
the lighting device being a LED tape
the lighting device being a LED rope light
the lighting device being rigid or comprising an elongated rigid housing, e.g. LED bars

title-part.text: Lighting devices intended to be free-standing

CPC-specific-text.text: lighting devices specially adapted to be transported from place to place, e.g. lighting devices carried on wheeled supports F21L; details of supports for lighting devices F21V21/00
being candle-shaped

reference.text: with varying lighting effect of simulating flames F21S10/04 ; string of light sources F21S4/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Table lamps, e.g. for ambient lighting
for task lighting, e.g. for reading or desk work, e.g. angle poise lamps
with a lamp housing in direct contact with the floor or ground
with a lamp housing maintained at a distance from the floor or ground via a support, e.g. standing lamp for ambient lighting
for direct lighting only, e.g. task lighting
for indirect lighting only, e.g. torchiere with reflector bowl directed towards ceiling
with a combination of direct and indirect lighting

title-part.text: Lighting devices intended for fixed installation

reference.text: F21S9/00 , F21S10/00 take precedence; using a string or strip of light sources F21S4/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Solar simulators, e.g. for testing photovoltaic panels

title-part.text: of recess-mounted type, e.g. downlighters

CPC-specific-text.text: details of recessed bases F21V21/04
intended to be recessed in a floor or like ground surface, e.g. pavement or false floor
intended to be recessed in a wall or like vertical structure, e.g. building facade
intended to be recessed in a ceiling or like overhead structure, e.g. suspended ceiling

of surface-mounted type

reference.text: F21S8/02 , F21S8/04 take precedence; details of wall or floor bases F21V21/02

note.note-paragraph: Group F21S8/03 does not correspond to former or future IPC groups. Correspondence CPC : IPC for this group is as following: - F21S8/03 : F21S8/00

CPC-specific-text.text: the device consisting essentially only of a light source holder with an exposed light source, e.g. a fluorescent tube
the surface being a floor or like ground surface, e.g. pavement
the surface being a wall or like vertical structure, e.g. building facade
by means of plugging into a wall outlet, e.g. night light
by means of a rigid support, e.g. bracket or arm
for mounting in a corner, i.e. between adjacent walls or wall and ceiling
intended to be mounted on a light track

reference.text: suspended from a light track F21S8/066 ; details of supporting elements displaceable along a guiding element F21V21/34

title-part.text: intended only for mounting on a ceiling or the like overhead structures

mounted by means of a rigid support, e.g. bracket or arm

title-part.text: by suspension

with a rigid pendant, i.e. a pipe or rod
multi-branched, e.g. a chandelier
from a light track

reference.text: details of supporting elements displaceable along a guiding element F21V21/34

CPC-specific-text.text: from a stretched wire

title-part.text: with a standard

CPC-specific-text.text: of low-built type, e.g. landscape light
of bollard type, i.e. with lighting fixture integrated into the standard or mounted on top of it and having substantially the same diameter
of high-built type, e.g. street light
with lighting device attached sideways of the standard, e.g. for roads and highways
with lighting device mounted on top of the standard, e.g. for pedestrian zones

title-part.text: specially adapted for vehicles

note.note-paragraph: This group is no longer used for the classification of new documents as from January 1st, 2012. The backlog of this group is being continuously reclassified to F21S48/00 and subgroups

title-part.text: providing single shaped beams or asymmetric beams, e.g. for penetrating fog or for preventing glare

note.note-paragraph: This group is no longer used for the classification of new documents as from January 1st, 2012. The backlog of this group is being continuously reclassified to F21S48/00 and subgroups

title-part.text: Lighting devices with a built-in power supply

the power supply being a battery or accumulator

using a supplementary light source for emergency lighting
rechargeable by using wind power, e.g. using wind turbines
rechargeable by using hydropower, e.g. using water powered turbines

title-part.text: rechargeable by exposure to light

CPC-specific-text.text: the solar unit being separate from the lighting unit

the solar unit and the lighting unit being located within or on the same housing

title-part.text: the power supply being a generator

CPC-specific-text.text: driven by wind power, e.g. by wind turbines
driven by hydropower, e.g. by water powered turbines

using light guides

title-part.text: Non-electric lighting
Non-electric lighting devices or systems using daylight

reference.text: roofs with sky-light opening E04D13/03 ; sun blinds for windows with means for redirecting light onto ceiling of a room E06B9/00 ; hybrid lighting devices combining artificial and natural light F21S19/00 ; solar heat collectors F24J2/00 ; solar cells or solar cell modules H01L31/00

CPC-specific-text.text: characterised by the means for collecting or concentrating the sunlight, e.g. parabolic reflectors or Fresnel lenses
with tracking means for following the position of the sun
characterised by the means for transmitting light into the interior of a building

Non-electric lighting devices or systems employing a light source of unspecified shape
Devices intended to be fixed, e.g. ceiling lamp, wall lamp
with a pendant

with suspension from a stretched wire

Devices intended to be free-standing, e.g. table lamp, floor lamp
Lighting systems
Non-electric lighting devices or systems employing light sources not covered by main groups F21S11/00 , F21S13/00 or F21S19/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Combining sunlight and electric light sources for indoor illumination
Lighting devices or systems specially adapted for vehicles
